snippet: In a letter sent to commanders and the prime minister, 43 veteran officers of a vaunted intelligence unit said they would refuse required reserve duty.
abstract: Forty-three veterans of Unite 8200, elite, secretive, Israeli military intelligence unit, write letter declaring they will no longer take part in Israel's actions against Palestinians in required reserve duty, citing Israel's 'immoral' treatment of Palestinians.
lead_paragraph: In a letter sent to commanders and the prime minister, 43 veteran officers of a vaunted intelligence unit said they would refuse required reserve duty.

headline.main: Veterans of Elite Israeli Unit Refuse Reserve Duty, Citing Treatment of Palestinians
headline.print_headline: Veterans of Elite Israeli Unit Refuse Reserve Duty, Citing Treatment of Palestinians
